name: ICE FLAME
description:
ICE FLAME - an exciting game about the adventures of an incredible cat who travels in search of magical fire through an icy mountain.
However, on the way to his goal, he will have to overcome many traps and overcome various obstacles on his difficult path!



Players will have to jump over chasms, run from dangerous thugs and literally make their way through the rotating cogwheels, avoiding traps. Pick up keys to open magical doors and complete the game by reaching Frostfire!



Game Features:
-Pixel graphics
-Lots of levels
-Interesting puzzles
